mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oa_calendar ( i_id, s_title, s_user_names, s_address, i_is_top, i_is_leader, i_remind_type, i_open_type, d_start_time, d_end_time, s_create_by, d_create_time, i_bus_model_id, i_bus_function_id, i_fun_data_id, task_user_id , task_id, i_is_state )VALUES( NULL, #{sTitle}, #{sUserNames}, #{sAddress}, #{iIsTop}, #{iIsLeader}, #{iRemindType}, #{iOpenType}, #{dStartTime}, #{dEndTime}, #{sCreateBy}, #{dCreateTime}, #{iBusModelId}, #{iBusFunctionId}, #{iFunDataId}, #{taskUserId}, #{taskId}, #{state} )
mapper.update: update oa_calendar c set c.s_title = #{sTitle}, c.s_user_names = #{sUserNames}, c.s_address =#{sAddress}, c.i_is_top = #{iIsTop}, c.i_is_leader =#{iIsLeader}, c.i_remind_type = #{iRemindType}, c.i_open_type = #{iOpenType}, c.d_start_time = #{dStartTime}, c.d_end_time = #{dEndTime}, c.s_create_by = #{sCreateBy}, c.d_create_time = #{dCreateTime}, c.i_bus_model_id = #{iBusModelId}, c.i_bus_function_id = #{iBusFunctionId}, c.i_fun_data_id = #{iFunDataId}, c.i_is_state = #{state}, c.task_user_id = #{taskUserId}, c.task_id = #{taskId} where c.i_id = #{iId};
mapper.select: select * from oa_calendar where i_id = #{id}
select c.* ,c.i_is_state as state from oa_calendar c where c.i_id = #{id}
select r.role_name from sys_user_role s INNER JOIN sys_role r where user_id=${drafterId} and s.role_id = r.id
select * from sys_user where show_order = #{showOrder}
select i_id from sys_user_managedepts where s_user_id =#{id}
select id from sys_depart where org_code =(select org_code from sys_user where id = #{id})
select dep_id from sys_user_depart where user_id=#{userNameId}
select * from oa_busdata30 where i_bus_function_id = 107 and s_title is not null and s_title <> "" and i_id = #{id}
SELECT i_id,i_bus_model_id,s_name FROM oa_bus_function ORDER BY i_bus_model_id
select s_file_path from oa_file where s_table = 'oa_busdata30' and i_table_id = #{id}
select * from oa_busdata30 where i_bus_function_id = 107 and i_is_display = 0 and s_create_by = #{sCreateBy}
select * from oa_busdata30 where i_bus_function_id = 107 and s_title is not null and s_title <> "" and s_create_by = #{sCreateBy}
select s_file_name from oa_file where s_table = 'oa_busdata30' and i_table_id = #{id}
select * from oa_calendar where task_user_id = #{taskUserId}
select * from oa_calendar c where c.i_fun_data_id = #{busDataId} and c.s_create_by = #{userName}
